description: File format for sound that can wrap various sound bitstreams, ranging from uncompressed LPCM waveform to MIDI.
extras: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?><metadata><field name="disclosure">Is open format.</field><field name="filenameExtension">aif, aiff, ief</field><field name="internetMediaType"></field><field name="pronomPUID"></field></metadata>
name: Audio Interchange File Format (AIFF)
